titleStmt.title: Wee under-subscribers masters and professors in the Colledge of New-Aberdeen, are constrained by pressing necessity to give this candid declaration of the low condition of this famous seminary wherein we bear charge

notesStmt.note: Title supplied by Wing: A Declaration by the masters and professors of New Aberdeen.
"Given at our colledge Marischall in New Aberdeen, the 7th. of Febr. 1660."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
